name: Blubbits Demo
description:
This is the first BLUBBITS demo. 

In the game it will be the tutorial level which introduces gameplay. Two additional levels are being prepared (one is almost ready, the other one is 75% ready).

Please check it out and provide some feedback, so I can improve the game :-)

Feedback here: http://www.blubbits.com/?page_id=110 

The game is made by BlooRabbit with Godot Engine and Blender. Music by Kilirane. 

Please keep in mind that this project is under development by a team of one. There are still a lot of bugs and nothing is final. I also advise playing with a joystick, rather than with the mouse.
